other_tests.findings: The gas and fluid collection medial to the sigmoid now measures 4.1 x 3.8 x 4.5 cm and is significantly smaller compared to a prior measurement but is slightly increased in size compared with another prior measurement. A smaller fluid collection to the right of the main collection measures 2.3 x 2.1 cm and is unchanged from prior. Significant fat stranding in the surrounding pelvis is stable. Residual intra-abdominal free air is slightly decreased in size compared with the previous exam.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The gas and fluid collection has decreased in size compared to a previous measurement but has slightly increased in size compared to an earlier measurement. The smaller fluid collection remains unchanged.
